attributes.action: reverse the decision to abolish the basic 10p income tax rate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While the decision to lower the basic income tax rate from 22p to 20p is welcome, this is offset by the abolition of the basic 10p rate for low-incomes.  This is completely unfair and shifts higher tax to poorer people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
